Quickstrike:







Inside his mind, Quickstrike began to panic. It told him he was in a bad 
position. He lightly kicked his feet, waking up from the posion that knocked 
him out. He opened his eyes and saw the ground, but not his feet with it. 
Primus! He was upside-down. He feared that he was in the hands of Hell 
Beast's soldiers. He began to scream weakly.
